backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, check-ins, pairing invite code features, and admin-gated RSVP/invite management with authorization and state modules.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading stored userProfiles by adding a default avatar field to each profile.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for avatar-related and paired-experience features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing various frontend React components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes plus global border and body styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point mounting the SPA root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application flow handling authentication, profile setup, pairing, and navigation between dashboard, emotional map, and settings views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarBa: Avatar badge component rendering a user's avatar or fallback via avatarUtils with size variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component showing flags, avatars, and auth controls based on identity, pairing, and profile state.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: UI for composing and submitting daily check-ins with emoji, message, premium limits, and success states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available emoji options and the max message length for check-ins.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check-in status for the user and partner, showing counts, latest entries, and loading state.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: Hook fetching historical check-ins from the actor with a configurable limit.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Hook for submitting a check-in and invalidating related query caches.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: Hook fetching the current day's check-ins from the actor.
Builds and exports a cleaned, sorted country list from ISO data and a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/country/CountriesM: Country selection component using a searchable popover list built from predefined country data.
Converts two-letter country codes into Unicode flag emojis.
frontend/src/features/country/iso3166Alp: Provides the complete ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 dataset of country codes and names.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Displays the user's and partner's recent check-in history with loading, empty, and detailed list states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Renders the main dashboard with daily check-in tools, relationship status, streaks, and history tabs.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Shows both partners' latest daily check-ins and compares their emotional states with syncing messages.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: Provides UI to generate an invite code or join a partner using a token, with copy and validation support.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook that disconnects a partner and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Generates an invite token via mutation and stores it for sharing.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Attempts to join a partner using an invite token and refreshes pairing-related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Fetches the current partner and partner profile to determine pairing status and related info.
frontend/src/features/profile/AvatarPick: Avatar selector with emoji presets, popover UI, preview, and clear option.
frontend/src/features/profile/avatarUtil: Utility functions for validating, normalizing, and generating avatar presets and fallbacks.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Dialog component for creating or completing a user profile with name, avatar, and country, saving via mutation.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: React Query hook that loads the current user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Hook that checks whether the current user has premium status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/profile/useSaveCal: Mutation hook to save the user's profile, validating fields and preserving backend-managed data.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI control for changing relationship status with validation, mutation, and toast notifications.
View for selecting an initial relationship status, saving via mutation and notifying on success or error.
Maps relationship statuses to Tailwind color classes and provides a lookup helper.
Defines the list of available relationship status strings.
Hook that fetches relationship status state, providing loading and derived status info.
Mutation hook to update the relationship status and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Settings page allowing users to edit profile fields, manage partner connection, and update relationship status.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Component displaying the shared streak count with animation on increase and conditional rendering when paired.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Hook that fetches the shared streak count from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing identity status to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are organized by feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and global typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Provides a helper to retrieve the latest check-in for a specific author from a list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including persisted URL values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling theming via CSS variables, plugins, custom colors, animations, and responsive settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature summaries, architectural notes, and known issues for the application.
